browser_action_title.message: Photo Screen Saver - click for options

chrome_extension_description.message: A screensaver with multiple photo sources, including your Google Photos.

desc_mode_switch.message:
Your current photo selections will be removed.

Continue with switch?

err_auth_revoked.message: You no longer have access to your Google Photos. Please reselect them.

err_chrome_signin.message: Please sign in to Chrome with the account that has your Google Photos.

err_chrome_signout.message: You are signed out of Chrome. Your Google Photos will not be available.

err_detect_faces_perm.message: Will not detect faces during pan and zoom.

err_geolocation_perm.message: You have not allowed location sharing

err_geolocation_title.message: Failed to update your current location

err_google_quota.message: Exceeded the daily Google Photos API limit.

err_load_album.message: Failed to retrieve Google Photo album

err_load_album_list.message: Failed to retrieve list of Google Photo albums

err_max_albums.message: The maximum number of album selections has been reached.

err_max_photos.message: The maximum number of photo selections has been reached.

err_optional_permissions.message: Failed to modify an optional permission

err_storage_desc.message: Deselect other photo sources and try again.

err_weather_perm.message: Weather information will not be available

google_shared_albums_note.message: Note: Shared albums may not be available.  See the FAQ for more info.

note_albums.message: Note: For more control over photo selections, create albums in Google Photos

off_abbrev.description: All Caps. max 3 letter abbreviation for OFF

permission_message.message: The extension has an optional permission that allows access to your Google Photos account.  If you click on ALLOW another dialog will be displayed asking you to allow or deny this permission, if you have not already done so.

permission_message1.message: In addition, you must be signed in to Chrome. If you sign out of Chrome or sign in as another user, your current album selections will be removed and you will need to reauthorize.

permission_message2.message: To completely revoke access, go to https://myaccount.google.com/permissions, click on the Photo Screen Saver app, and select REMOVE ACCESS. This usually requires a few minutes to take effect.

photo_no_filter_desc.message: Use your most recent photos of any type

power_abbrev.description: All Caps. max 3 letter abbreviation for POWER

setting_500yest_desc.message: Recent photos from the 500px, updated daily

setting_all_displays_desc.message: Show screensaver on all connected displays

setting_background_desc.message: Starts Chrome on computer boot and keeps running when closed (Recommended)

setting_bg_desc.message: Set the background image of the screensaver

setting_chromecast_desc.message: Some backdrop photos from the Chromecast device

setting_dark_mode_desc.message: Use dark colors for this page

setting_detect_faces_desc.message: Use pattern recognition to pan and zoom to people's faces

setting_flickr_api.message: This product uses the Flickr API but is not endorsed or certified by Flickr

setting_flickr_int_desc.message: Interesting photos from the Flickr, updated daily

setting_full_res.message: Use full resolution for photos you own

setting_full_res_desc.message: These files may be very large and rotated

setting_full_screen.message: Do not show over fullscreen Chrome windows

setting_full_screen_desc.message: Useful if you are watching videos

setting_keep_awake_desc.message: Prevent display from sleeping (always active if start and stop times are equal)

setting_location_desc.message: Will not show Google Photos 'estimated' location

setting_mine_desc.message: Photos from the guy who wrote this

setting_pan_and_scan_desc.message: Apply the "Ken Burns" effect to the photos

setting_photo_clicks.message: Show source of photo on mouse click, if available

setting_photog.message: Show album name for your photos

setting_reddit_animal_desc.message: Animal photos from reddit, updated daily

setting_reddit_city_desc.message: Primarily cityscape photos from reddit, updated daily

setting_reddit_earth_desc.message: Primarily landscape photos from reddit, updated daily

setting_reddit_space_desc.message: Primarily celestial photos from reddit, updated daily

setting_skip_desc.message: Do not display certain photos in Zoom and Full modes

setting_start_time_desc.message: Allow screensaver display, starting at this time

setting_stop_time_desc.message: Disallow screensaver display after this time

setting_suspend_desc.message: Computer may sleep during inactive time

setting_unsplash_architecture_desc.message: Architecture photos from Unsplash, updated daily

setting_unsplash_city_desc.message: City photos from Unsplash, updated daily

setting_unsplash_nature_desc.message: Primarily landscape photos from Unsplash, updated daily

setting_unsplash_people_desc.message: People photos from Unsplash, updated daily

setting_weather_desc.message: You will be prompted to allow viewing your location and accessing the weather api

sleep_abbrev.description: All Caps. max 3 letter abbreviation for SLEEP

temp_unit.description: Set to F for Fahrenheit C for Celsius

time_format.description: Set to 12 for AM/PM format or 24

tooltip_keep_awake.message: The Keep awake features are available even if the screensaver is disabled, so you can use the app as a general power scheduler. The icon will display 'PWR' when in this state.
